page.title: 08BALQUHIDDER A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: My name is Alcuin Arkotxa. I live in {Rob Roy's house}called Tuarach. We are a family of four; my brother, my dad who is Spanish, and my mum who is half English and Scottish. I get up at 7.00am, have my breakfast, take the dog for a walk and feed the animals. We have hens, rabbits, ducks and mice. When I get ready for school I walk down the fields and get to the narrows between Loch Voil and Loch Doine and {row across.}Then I run up the field and wait at the gate for the{school {taxi.}At school I meet my pals. After school I tend my animals again and ride my horse. We like travelling and have been to China, India, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, America and Europe.
